text: Alberto Zaccheroni (born 1 April 1953) is an Italian football manager. He led A.C. Milan to win the Serie A in 98/99. He currently manages the Japan national football team. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Profile on Goal.com Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Emilia-Romagna Category:Italian football managers Category:Japan national football team managers Category:A.C. Milan managers Category:S.S. Lazio managers
title: Alberto Zaccheroni
